body.name: Nictemaw Portable Washing Machine, 17.8Lbs Capacity Full-Automatic Portable Washer with Drain Pump, 2.4Cu.ft Washer and Dryer Combo with Glass Top Lid, LED Display, 10 Programs & 8 Water Levels for Apartment, Dorms, RV
body.stockDetail: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Smart Control Panel & Easy to Operate】--This portable washing machine features a versatile and simple control panel that allows you to start a program by simply choosing the mode you need. With 8 water levels and 10 programs, through an LED digital display screen, all functions are clear at a glance. The washing and spinning functions can be used separately, and the fully automatic function system frees up your hands, no longer need to worry about hand washing.

【Large Capacity & Compact Design】--Comes with a spacious 17.8 lbs capacity, our turbo wash technology saves you time while still giving you a great and powerful clean. The 2-in-1 compact design of the washer and spin dryer will save your space and 2 side handles make it easy to move, which is perfect for a home, dormitory, campsite, RV, etc.

【Exquisite Clear Glass Top Lid Design】--The panoramic glass transparent top design brings a splash of color to this washing machine, which is more fashionable and delicate. At the same time, the water intake and laundry conditions can be monitored at any time. The high-quality built-in drain pump and upgraded extended drain hose can easily drain sewage from the washer to a low or high position randomly. We also have the faucet adapter for easy installation of water hoses.

【Don't Worry About Drainage at All】--With the powerful performance built-in drain pump and upgraded extended drain hose can easily drain sewage from the washer to low or high places. We also have a faucet adapter for easy installation of water hoses. Adapts latest high-quality motor provides constant and smooth power to easily spin dry up to 95% of the water. The washing process is quieter, which can save 85% of energy compared with similar types, saving money for your family.

【More Peace of Mind & Worry-free】--When you don't have free time to wait for your laundry, please use the 24-hour delayed start function of this portable washer, which can effectively help you to solve this problem. The safe child lock makes your family life more secure. The tub self-cleaning function makes your laundry environment healthier. The honeycomb-shaped stainless steel inner tank and fluff stain filter can effectively remove stains and hair on clothes, and reduce clothes wear.

【Auto Unbalance Detection & Adjustable Base】--This washer and dryer combo can autonomously detect and correct the imbalance of the clothes to ensure an even washing and effectively remove stains. The adjustable base not only solves the terrain problem and can be adjusted to your desired height. This washing machine has intuitive diagrams and instructions, easy to install, if you have any problems, please feel free to contact our customer service team to get help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large Capacity Wash & Spin Dry Fast & Clean

MAIN REASONS TO CHOOSE SMART CONTROL PANEL This washing machine is very easy to operate via its touch control panel. Heavy, Soft, Normal, Rapid and Soak programs, you are allowed to quickly start the machine as you need. You can customize washing program by selecting load size, adding additional wash time, rinse time and spin time as well. BUILT-IN DRAIN PUMP The washing machine is equipped with an extended drain pipe and a drain pump to help your washing machine drain water easily and quickly. If the faucet does not match the inlet hose, you can use the adapter included in the accessories. With this washing machine, you will find washing is an easy job.
New Way Of Washing Simple & Clear Installation

WE PAY ATTENTION TO EVERY DETAIL! Child Lock Function Don’t worry about the child accidentally touch the washing machine. Protect the child touch the machine, bring more safety to your family! Auto Unbalance Detection With automatic unbalance detection which can correct imbalance automatically and avoid vibration if the clothes is not distributed equally. Intelligent Water Level System The latest technology motor works with extremely low noise and high power to ensure the best cleaning performance. The energy consumption is very low. 24H Smart Delay Function With 24 hour delay function. You can choose the desired start time by pressing the program button, and it is flexible to arrange your own time.
For Your Home, Apartment, Laundry Room, Dormitory and RV! Previous page Next page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great washing machine for my in-law suite
reviews.reviewText: I love the size and how well it cleans clothes. I also love how light and easy it was to set it up. My tenant especially likes the different cycles this washing machine was a great buy!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hello! AMAZEMENT ALERT!🚨My 100% honest review about this is that this is the best washer I have ever gotten!Super economical,worth every pinnie (pocket friendly) weightless machine,very detergent friendly (doesn’t need a lot of detergent) all in all AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING!But just a small tip,don’t overload it as it might spill more water which can be a problem! Other than that enjoy the stress free laundry day with the best smells all over the place🙏🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had this for about a month of so and this is blessing,Spin cycle .. man clothes about dry before u put it in dryer .. ALOT of time saved versus the one I had before with a twin washer n spinner.I love this ,no leaking ,no nothing but good washing.Its Quiet too!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicetaw Portable Washing Machine 17.8 lb capacity for apartments and small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I needed a portable washing machine that was large enough to wash a fluffy, full size duvet cover and more than two towels at a time. The Nicetaw 17.8 lb washing machine has a very good capacity and was able to fit my fluffy duvet. The price for the Nicetaw was reasonable for the size and capabilities offered.The Nicetaw washing machine washed the items well, the rinse/ spin cycle drained the water and the soap efficiently Water levels are adjustable for each wash. Drain hose is attached to side of machine when draining. I do not have a designated space for the machine. I have to move it each time I use it, but it can be filled manually with a shower head or hose, which is easier for me than hooking it up to the faucet each time.Pros: Price and capacity. Save money on laundromat visits. It will pay for itself with the money saved. Included hardware for hook up. Can be filled manually. Has many washing options and water level controls.Cons: It is heavy and hard to move so a designated spot is ideal, No manual drain option. Draining pump is loud when draining. Loud beeps each time you press the selection buttons.Overall, it is a great option for apartments. The price is competitive for the options included and the capacity offered. It will enable me to clean my full sized duvet covers , quilts, towels and other heavy items without leaving home, and that was my goal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: For apartments or other small spaces this is a very nice machine. The washer drum was surprisingly large, and can easily fit a week's worth of clothes. I find though that it works best when not overloaded and filled to the top, so I only ever fill clothes a little more than half way up, and Ill just wait to do a second load.Also, use LESS detergent than you think. More detergent does not mean cleaner, it just means your clothes will dry very stiff, and youre just wasting money. With this size, I never use more than the 2 Load mark on the detergent cap, and its works great. Add a little bit on vinegar to the first rinse cycle to really wash away any soap residue and clothes will be softer without tumble drying. The machine is quieter than expected, and has operated flawlessly. Very happy with this purchase, at a very good price! Will pay for itself in about 4-6 months I imagine, by avoiding the $15-20 at the laundromat every week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable Washing Machine
reviews.reviewText: I love this Washing Machine. You can hook it up to the sink or water connection in your laundry room. It washes really well and holds a good amount of clothes. I like that it's digital with different settings and water level settings and even can spin air dry your clothes as well. Very portable and light weight. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoying the washer, has so many settings for all your needs. Even has a air dry setting that gets the clothes so close to dry everything comes out pretty well dry. Love it. Happy with the choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best portable washing machine!
reviews.reviewText: I chose this product after doing some research on different products, so I knew it was going to be a good one, but it is even better than what I expected! The size is perfect for apartments and dorm units, and it can even fit in a small closet despite that the machine has a pretty large capacity. The machine has 10 different modes (programs) with different washing/drying cycles; for instance, the "Normal" mode is 45 minutes and it washes the clothes for about 20 mins, then rinses them twice, and finally spins them to make them as dry as possible. The drainage works perfectly and I don't have any problems with draining from the machine to higher places. Moreover, the machine is not very heavy and can be moved pretty easily. It is also quiet and doesn't make too much noise.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Der Griff hat perfekt gepasst und war gut zu montieren. Der letzte Griff ist leider abgebrochen. Dieses Ersatzteil hat das Leben unserer Waschmaschine nun verlängert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived well on time, it fitted well and works great. plenty of videos on YouTube to show you how to fit it.
